ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who are filled with the fear of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely those who live in awe of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely those who stand in awe for fear of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Only those who are, out of fear of Him, humble before their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed those who are overwhelmed due to the fear of their Lord –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those who live in awe for fear of their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely they who from fear of their Lord are cautious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely those who tremble in fear of their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! those who go in awe for fear of their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who tremble with fear of their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily those who for fear of their Lord are in awe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed those who are apprehensive for the fear of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily those who live in awe for fear of their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! Those who live in awe for fear of their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who tremble in fear of their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who, from awe of their Lord, are fearful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:57] Surely those who, for fear of their Lord, are apprehensive, are fearful of His chastisement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then Allah clarified to whom He hastens with good things in the life of this world, saying: (Lo! those who go in awe for fear of their Lord) of their Lord's chastisement; for these We hasten with good things;
